English.Text: Stress only serves to highlight your crew's lack of skill. Eager to get away from the lethal tree's canopy as fast as possible, they hastily tie two branches together and call it a stretcher. The precarious device barely holds the weight of the wounded man, and it collapses almost immediately. The man hits the floor with a thud, and his howl of pain forecasts the worst: a fragment has pierced his liver. The man writhes in a feverish agony for days before drawing his last breath.
